price: ¡auyãwã ne mafi tsananin* kãfirci da munãfinci, kuma sũne mafi kamanta ga, rashin sanin haddõjin abin da Allah Ya saukar a kan ManzonSa. Kuma Allah ne Masani, Mai hikima.
arabic: ٱلۡأَعۡرَابُ أَشَدُّ كُفۡرٗا وَنِفَاقٗا وَأَجۡدَرُ أَلَّا يَعۡلَمُواْ حُدُودَ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٞ
footnotes: * Ƙauyãwã ne mafi tsananin kãfirci dõmin nĩsansu daga sanin hãlãyen girmamãwã da na zamantakewa, sa'an nan da nĩsansu daga Annabi har su saurari abin da ya zo da shi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: al-aʿrābu ashaddu kuf'ran wanifāqan wa-ajdaru allā yaʿlamū ḥudūda mā anzala al-lahu ʿalā rasūlihi wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
